title: Assets & Resources
description: Available financial assets and resources for {NAME}

sections.title: {NAME_POS} Assets Assessment
sections.help_text: Enter {NAME_POS} asset details. All fields are optional - skip any that don't apply.

sections.title: Household Context
sections.help_text: Let me know if anyone else shares ownership or limits how assets can be used.

options.label: No, assets are only in my name

fields.help: Example: community property rules, assets earmarked for a spouse, or power-of-attorney considerations.

fields.label: Checking Accounts
fields.help: Total balance across all checking accounts

fields.label: Savings & CDs
fields.help: Savings accounts, money market accounts, certificates of deposit

fields.label: Cash on Hand
fields.help: Physical cash kept at home or in a safe

info_boxes.message: üí∞ Liquid assets are important for immediate care costs. Medicaid allows up to $2,000 for individuals (2024).

fields.label: Stocks & Bonds

fields.help: Options, commodities, cryptocurrency, or other investment vehicles

info_boxes.message: üìà Investment accounts can provide flexibility for care costs. Note any restrictions or market timing concerns.

fields.help: Pre-tax retirement accounts (Traditional IRA, 401(k), 403(b), SEP-IRA, etc.)

fields.label: Roth IRA / Roth 401(k)
fields.help: Post-tax retirement accounts (Roth IRA, Roth 401(k))

fields.help: Current lump-sum value of pension (if applicable and accessible)

sections.title: Real Estate & Other
sections.help_text: Property, vehicles, and other valuable assets

fields.label: Real Estate (Total)
fields.help: Enter total real estate value in Basic mode. Calculated automatically in Advanced mode.

basic.help: Enter your total real estate value. We'll split it evenly across primary home and other property.

advanced.help: Automatically calculated from home equity and other real estate below.

unallocated.label: Unallocated Real Estate
unallocated.help: Difference between your original estimate and allocated amounts. Not included in calculations.

fields.label: Home Equity (Estimate)
fields.help: Estimated home value minus outstanding mortgage

fields.label: Real Estate - Other Property
fields.help: Rental properties, vacation homes, land, etc.

fields.label: Life Insurance Cash Value
fields.help: Cash surrender value of life insurance policies

info_boxes.message: üè† Primary home is often Medicaid-exempt (up to equity limits). Consider timing and liquidity for accessing home equity.

fields.label: Total Debts (All)
fields.help: Enter total debt in Basic mode. Calculated automatically in Advanced mode.

basic.help: Enter your total debt. We'll split it evenly across mortgage, other real estate debt, secured loans, and unsecured debt.

advanced.help: Automatically calculated from all debt categories below.

unallocated.label: Unallocated Debt
unallocated.help: Difference between your original estimate and allocated amounts. Not included in calculations.

fields.label: Primary Residence Mortgage Balance
fields.help: Outstanding mortgage balance on your primary residence (if home_equity_estimate already accounts for this, leave at $0)

fields.label: Other Real Estate Debt
fields.help: Mortgages or loans on rental properties, vacation homes, etc.

fields.label: Secured Loans
fields.help: Auto loans, boat loans, equipment loans, home equity lines of credit, etc.

fields.label: Unsecured Debt
fields.help: Credit card balances, personal loans, medical debt, etc.

info_boxes.message: üí° Debts reduce your net worth available for care. Medicaid asset limits consider net value after debts.
‚ö†Ô∏è If your home_equity_estimate already subtracts the mortgage, set primary_residence_mortgage to $0 to avoid double-counting.

summary.label: Net Assets
summary.help: Total assets minus total debts. Calculated automatically from the values you entered above.
